weakness.name: Undetected brute force attempts on MS Azure management console
weakness.desc: The failure connection attempts (brute force) must be audited and monitored and correspondent personnel must be alerted and informed.

test.steps:
1. Go to "Monitor" and then to "Alerts".
  2. Check that there is any rule to notify when several console login failure attempts occur.
  3. Check if these rules are enabled.
